name: vibe-da-ibm-cloud-max-vibe-lite-autoseed-auto-vars
display_name: Vibe Landing Zone — Max Vibe (Lite, Secure, Auto-Seed, Auto-Vars)
description: Lite-tier only. Provisions COS (public-read), auto-generates HMAC, embeds a Cloud Function web action for presigned PUT URLs, auto-uploads the vibey CodeMirror IDE as index.html during apply, and opens a primary output link to the live app. Manifest ✨ pushes updates securely via signed URLs.

variables.name: bucket_prefix
variables.description: Prefix for the bucket name; a 6-char suffix is added.

outputs.name: upload_endpoint
outputs.description: Web action URL for get-presigned-url (pre-embedded guest/default).

outputs.name: hmac_access_key_id
outputs.description: Generated COS HMAC access key id (for reference).

outputs.name: hmac_secret_access_key
outputs.description: Generated COS HMAC secret access key (for reference).
